detectors.description:
YJCToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#45-52) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(_value > 0 && balances[_to] + _value > balances[_to] && balances[msg.sender] > _value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#46)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#47)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#48)
detectors.markdown:
[YJCToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#L45-L52) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:

detectors.description:
YJCToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#55-63) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(allowan > _value && balances[_from] >= _value && _to == msg.sender && balances[_to] + _value > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#57)
	- allowances[_from][_to] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#58)
	- balances[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#59)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YJCToken.sol#60)
